Locatedinside	the	existing	Novozymesplant,	this	building	was	intended	to	receive	two	new	tanktainersintegrated	in	the	new	SDC	Dosage	System.•Steel	Structure	with	Shallow	Concrete	Foundations;•Area	–274.34	m2•Maximum	Span	–14.80	m;•Total	Height	–11.54	m;
GRIFA	ENGENHARIAP&G	MIXING	CENTER,	BRAZIL
2023PROFESSIONALPORTFOLIO	–	NUNO	FERRINHA4Locatedclose	to	the	existing	P&G	Plant,	this	building	is	intended	to	be	the	new	distribution	centerof	the	Louveira’splant	products,being	the	company’s	biggest	one	in	Latin	America.•Roof	Steel	Structure	supported	by	Precast	Concrete	Columns;•Deep	Pile	Foundations;•24x24	m	span	modulus;•Building’s	Maximum	Height	–16.4	m;•Area	–53790	m2;•Structural	Concrete	Floor	able	to	support	up	to	50	kN/m2;•1.25	m	retaining	wall	all	around	the	building;•Structure	adapted	for	loading	docks;

GRIFA	ENGENHARIAP&G	LIQUIDSPLANT,	BRAZIL
2023PROFESSIONALPORTFOLIO	–	NUNO	FERRINHA5Together	with	Mixing	Center,	the	new	P&G	Plant	intended	to	extend	the	plant’s	production.	Together	with	main	building	was	designed	a	tank	farm,	two	buildings	to	receive	utilities	and	a	building	to	serve	as	laboratory.•Roof	Steel	Structure	supported	by	Steel	Columns;•Deep	Pile	Foundations;•16x12	m	span	modulus;•8x12	m	span	modulus	steel	deck	production	mezzanine;•Building’s	Maximum	Height	–16.4	m;•Area	–13031	m2;•Structural	Concrete	Floor	able	to	support	up	to	50	kN/m2;•1.25	m	retaining	wall	all	around	the	building;•Structure	adapted	for	loading	docks;•768	m2technical	area	on	the	building’s	roof;•Bases	for	tanks	of	up	to	150	tons;•Pipe-Rack	connecting	the	tank	farm	and	the	plant

GRIFA	ENGENHARIAFIOCRUZYELLOW	FEVER	VACCINEPLANT,	BRAZIL
2023PROFESSIONALPORTFOLIO	–	NUNO	FERRINHA6Belonging	to	the	state	owned	Oswaldo	Cruz	Foundation,	this	plant	includes	a	Production	Building,	a	Warehouse,	a	Laboratory,	a	R&D	building,	a	Boiler	House,	a	Sewage	Treatment	Building	and	a	Utilities	Building•All	buildings	designed	in	Precast	Concrete;•Cast	In-Place	Concrete	Shallow	Foundations;•The	buildings	with	multiple	storey	were	designed	using	hollow	core	slabs;•Lateral	Closingformedby	Precast	Concrete	Panels;•Plant	Total	Area	–25000	m2,	being	half	of	it	allocated	to	the	Production	Building•Maximum	10.8x8.4	m	span	modulus;•Building’s	Maximum	Height	–12	m;•Structural	Concrete	Floor	able	to	support	up	to	50	kN/m2;

GRIFA	ENGENHARIAGALDERMAPLANT,	BRAZIL
2023PROFESSIONALPORTFOLIO	–	NUNO	FERRINHA7Belonging	to	the	pharmaceutic	company	Galderma,	the	new	plant	is	intended	to	expand	the	actual	production	in	Brazil.	Thenew	plant	includesa	Production	Building,	a	Warehouse,	an	Administration	Building,	a	Gatehouse,	a	Utilities	Building	and	an	Inflammable	Products	Deposit.•Mix	of	Roof	Steel	Structure	supported	by	Precast	Concrete	Structure	together	with	buildings	designed	entirely	in	Precast	concrete•Cast	In-Place	Concrete	Deep	Foundations	(Piles	and	Caisson	Foundations);•Buildings	Total	Area	–14323	m2,	being	around	10000	m2allocated	to	the	Warehouse	and	the	Production	Building;•Maximum	20x24	m	span	modulus	in	the	Warehouse;•Building’s	Maximum	Height	–13.64	m;•Concrete	Bases	for	equipments;•Structural	Concrete	Floor	able	to	support	up	to	50	kN/m2in	the	Warehouse,	Production	Building,	Utilities	Building	and	Inflammable	Products	Deposit;

GRIFA	ENGENHARIAP&G	PILAR	PLANT,	ARGENTINA
2023PROFESSIONALPORTFOLIO	–	NUNO	FERRINHA8Locatedinside	the	existing	Procter&Gambleunitin	Pilar,	this	building	was	intended	to	receive	the	Dilute	Making	Capacity	Expansion.Roof	Steel	Structure	supported	by	Steel	Columns;Cast	In-Place	Concrete	Shallow	Foundations;Lateral	Closing	Steel	Structure;Total	Area	–660.24	m2;Maximum	7.7x24	m	span	modulus;Building’s	Maximum	Height	–10.88	m;Structure	ready	for	a	future	expansion;Concrete	Bases	for	equipments;Structural	Concrete	Floor	able	to	support	up	to	50	kN/m2;
